text: Lisa Post (born 27 January 1999) is a Dutch field hockey defender from Eindhoven. She plays with HC Oranje-Rood and the Netherlands women's national field hockey team. ==Career== ===Club Hockey=== Burg played with HC Oranje- Rood and moved to SCHC in 2022. ===Under-21 National Team=== Post played with the national Underâ€“21 team at the 2017 Women's EuroHockey Junior Championship and 2019 Women's EuroHockey Junior Championship. ===Senior National Team=== Burg made her internatioal debut during the 2019 Women's FIH Pro League. She was selected in the Netherlands squad for the 2022 Women's FIH Hockey World Cup, held in July 2022. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch field hockey players Category:Sportswomen
title: Lisa Post
